main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDimLoan] Script Date: 18/09/2012 16:34:22 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblDimLoan]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblDimLoan]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblDimLoan] Script Date: 05/03/2012 16:34:22 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblDimLoan]( [DimLoanID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [AccountNo] [varchar](20) NOT NULL, [PaymentTypeCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [PaymentTypeCodeActual] [varchar](20) NULL, [PaymentTypeDesc] [varchar](300) NULL, [MortgageInsuranceInd] [varchar](20) NULL, [MortgageInsurancePolicyNo] [varchar](20) NULL, [MortgageInsurerCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [MortgageInsurerDesc] [varchar](300) NULL, [InterestRateTypeCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [InterestRateTypeDesc] [varchar](50) NULL, [ProductCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [ProductType] [varchar](20) NULL, [LoanStatus] [varchar](20) NULL, [ProductDescription] [varchar](300) NULL, [ProductSubCode] [varchar](20) NULL, [OrganisationCode] [varchar](3) NULL, [ScrubbedFlag] [varchar](20) NULL, [DimPoolID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [IncludedAuditLoan] bit NULL DEFAULT 0, [OffsetIndicator] [varchar](10) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_tblDimLoan] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimLoanID] ASC, [DimPoolID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
